name: Residential Mortgage
description: A loan secured against residential property, used by consumers to purchase or refinance a home. Subject to FCA mortgage conduct rules under MCOB.

name: Buy-to-Let Mortgage
description: A mortgage secured against property purchased for rental income. Consumer buy-to-let regulated under MCOB; professional landlord BTL falls outside FCA regulation but Consumer Duty may still apply.

name: Equity Release
description: A lifetime mortgage or home reversion plan allowing consumers aged 55+ to access property equity. Subject to MCOB Chapter 9 specialist requirements and enhanced Consumer Duty protections.

name: Personal Loan
description: An unsecured fixed-term loan to a consumer for personal purposes. Regulated under the Consumer Credit Act and FCA consumer credit rules in CONC.

name: Credit Card
description: A revolving credit facility allowing consumers to borrow up to a pre-set limit for purchases, balance transfers and cash advances. Regulated under CONC.

name: BNPL / Deferred Payment
description: Buy now pay later and deferred payment credit agreements, typically interest-free for short periods. Becoming FCA-regulated under CONC with specific disclosure and affordability requirements.

name: High-Cost Short-Term Credit
description: Short-term, high-interest consumer credit including payday loans. Subject to enhanced CONC requirements including price caps, affordability checks and specific risk warnings.

name: Current Account
description: A transactional bank account providing day-to-day banking services including payments, direct debits and standing orders. Regulated under BCOBS and payment services legislation.

name: Savings Account
description: A deposit account designed for consumers to save money and earn interest. Subject to FCA banking conduct of business rules under BCOBS.

name: Business Current Account
description: A transactional bank account for SMEs and commercial entities. BCOBS applies to business banking customers; Consumer Duty applies where the firm deals with micro-enterprises or charities.

name: Business Savings Account
description: A deposit account for SME and commercial clients to hold reserves and earn interest. Subject to BCOBS banking conduct rules.

name: Investment Product (Retail)
description: Investment products marketed to retail consumers including funds, structured deposits and portfolio management services. Subject to MiFID II requirements and COBS.

name: SIPP / Personal Pension
description: Self-invested personal pension or standard personal pension scheme. Subject to COBS suitability and disclosure rules, with additional pension-specific requirements including transfer advice rules.

name: Workplace Pension
description: An employer-sponsored pension scheme including auto-enrolment qualifying schemes. Subject to COBS communications and governance requirements, plus TPR oversight.

name: Discretionary Portfolio
description: A managed investment portfolio where the firm makes investment decisions on behalf of the client. Subject to COBS suitability, best execution and reporting requirements. Available to retail and professional clients.

name: Advisory Investment Service
description: A service providing personal investment recommendations to clients. Subject to COBS suitability requirements, independence rules and disclosure obligations. Available to retail and professional clients.

name: Structured Product
description: A pre-packaged investment combining derivatives with traditional assets to provide defined risk-return profiles. Subject to enhanced COBS disclosure, appropriateness testing and PRIIPs KID requirements.

name: Retail Fund (UCITS/NURS)
description: An authorised collective investment scheme (UCITS or non-UCITS retail scheme) marketed to retail investors. Subject to COBS communications, KIID/KID disclosure and distribution rules.

name: General Insurance
description: Non-life insurance products sold to consumers including home, motor, travel and pet insurance. Regulated under ICOBS.

name: Protection Insurance
description: Life insurance, income protection, critical illness cover and payment protection insurance. Subject to ICOBS disclosure and claims handling rules, plus enhanced Consumer Duty vulnerability considerations.

name: Travel Insurance
description: Insurance covering risks associated with travel including medical expenses, cancellation, baggage and personal liability. Subject to ICOBS, with FCA focus on value, signposting and claims handling.

name: Payment Service
description: Payment initiation, account information and electronic money services provided to consumers. Subject to the Payment Services Regulations and PSD2.

name: Commercial Mortgage
description: A loan secured against commercial property for business purposes. Outside FCA perimeter for most commercial borrowers but Consumer Duty applies where the borrower is a micro-enterprise or sole trader.

name: Invoice Finance
description: A working capital facility where a business borrows against unpaid invoices, including factoring and invoice discounting. Generally outside FCA regulation but Consumer Duty applies where the borrower is a micro-enterprise or sole trader. CCA may apply to unincorporated businesses.

name: Trade Finance
description: Financial products supporting international and domestic trade, including letters of credit, documentary collections, trade loans and supply chain finance. Primarily commercial products outside FCA perimeter but Consumer Duty applies to micro-enterprise borrowers.
